pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: KUOW-FM / Puget Sound Public Radio / University of Washington
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Primarily interviews and live musical performances featuring international newsmakers to local musicians. Includes nearly complete (app. 450 hours) archive of live-performance show, "Sandy Bradley's POTLUCK," aired on KUOW in Seattle and about 50 non-commercial US stations between 1984-1995. Also hundreds of hours of live folk, classical and world-music concerts from Puget Sound region. A large portion of this material has been archived in digital (.wav/44.1/16) format (done in 2008).
pageContext._xxxcollectionExtentxtxt: > 1000 reel-to-reel analogue tapes, several hundred DATs, small number of cassettes, MDs, CDs

_xxxcollectionInventoryDescriptionxtxtxx: Digital text document (other than spreadsheet or database)
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: Digitized material from the archives has been used in-house for historical reference, as well as using some musical performances for additional (non-main broadcast channel) program services.
